means: 使…痛苦(pain的过去式和和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: At the com-munity centre, mention of funds produces pained looks.
sentence.Network_cn: 在社区中心一提到资金问题，大家就会愁眉不展。

sentence.Network_en: He was pained to see many youngsters deserting kibbutz life.
sentence.Network_cn: 看到那么多的年轻人放弃了合作农场的生活，他感到很痛心。

sentence.Network_en: This public acknowledgment of Ted's disability pained my mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一下大家都知道了特德的残疾，这让母亲非常痛苦。

entry.tran: （表情等）痛苦的，忧虑的，恼火的
entry.def: If you have a pained expression or look, you look upset, worried, or slightly annoyed.

sentences.en: She looked pained when I refused to help.
